name: PokExp
storyline:
It is said that a long time ago, Pokémon created life and death. Wandah area has always been under their influence. Today, the legend says that these Pokémon are gone, but nobody really knows what happened to them. 
 
You, young trainer, are rather intrigued by this story. But your main goal is to travel in the region, win badges and face the league to become the Master!
summary:
PokExp is a French Fangame about Pokémon, with a large community !  
 
Fight trainers, find shinies and other glowing Pokémon, encounter legends in an unique world !
